Please help my name on facebook wrong and I can not edit my name is Sari and not Sare

replies.message:
Hi Sari, here are instructions to help you change your name. 

1. In the top right corner, tap the lines that look like this ☰. 
2. Scroll down to Account Settings and Tap it.
3. Next Tap [General] and you will see your name. 
4. Tap it then you should be able to change it. 

Hope that helps.
